title: Activist identifies developer's cross-jurisdiction pattern
content:
Scenario: Activist identifies developer's cross-jurisdiction pattern
    Given a developer is proposing controversial project
    And uses familiar tactics from other campaigns
    When the Observer tracks developer across municipalities
    Then the activist sees the same firm using identical playbook in 8 cities
    And views track record of community promises vs delivery
    And identifies political relationships and campaign donations
    And systematic exploitation becomes undeniable
    And activists coordinate across jurisdictions
